articles.title: Fans question whether Buzz Lightyear voice actor Tim Allen was axed for political views - Daily Mail
articles.description: Allen, 68 provided the voice for Buzz Lightyear in all of the original Toy Story films, but has been replaced in the upcoming 'Lightyear' movie by Captain America actor Chris Evans.
articles.content: Toy Story fans are speculating whether the voice actor for beloved Toy Story character Buzz Lightyear, Tim Allen, has been axed from the character's upcoming origin movie due to his conservative poli… [+5473 chars]

articles.title: Meeting Between Francis and Biden Will Highlight Their Rift With American Bishops - The New York Times
articles.description: The pope and president, who meet at the Vatican on Friday, are the common targets of conservative American bishops seeking to undercut them.
articles.content: But Francis has apparently grown frustrated in recent months with the hostile corners of the American church and their media megaphone. The American Catholic television network, EWTN, is arguably the… [+1918 chars]
